casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

July 2, 2010

[Cite as 07/02/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-3095.]

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2007-2048. State ex rel. Sunoco, Inc. v. Robey.

Franklin App. No. 06AP-361. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s application for dismissal,

It is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. Accordingly, this cause is dismissed.
